note.title: Latest updates
note.para: The latest documentation updates are usually available in the English version of the documentation.

listitem.para: For offline use, find documentation in your installed system under /usr/share/doc. Many commands are also described in detail in their manual pages. To view them, run man, followed by a specific command name. If the man command is not installed on your system, install it with sudo zypper install man.
